location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.247 of 1820, from James Farish, Secretary to Government, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter enclosing the extract of a statement of balance (not included in the file), due by individuals and amounting to 12,258 rupees. Farish requests information from Bruce that is required by the Marine Board.
